title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed in a way that is not clear to users. Some actions are in the context menu, while others are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch views to access all the available actions in the editor.
OB: The action "Add Javadoc Comment" should be included in the context menu.
EB: All actions should be accessible from the editor, either in the context menu or through some other global menu.
SR: Ensure that all actions are easily accessible to users, either in the context menu or through a global menu.
